description:
In this course you will enhance your presentation by using features that will transform it into a powerful means of communication. You will customize the PowerPoint interface to suit the requirements and use features to create presentations.

Consider taking SONIC's Microsoft PowerPoint 2010 for Beginner course.

Our Microsoft courses help you to prepare for the official Microsoft Office Specialist exam.
title: Microsoft PowerPoint 2010 Intermediate/Advanced
instructors: SONIC - High Quality Training for Over 20 Years
